Date: Wednesday, 6/11/1989
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Gene Richards



Date: Wednesday, 6/18/1989
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Dale Murphy



Date: Monday, 6/30/1989
Subject: Progress of Luis M. Lopez
Dear Sir,
Luis M. Lopez has an AVG of .281 at A Spartanburg Phillies!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
